carrying.name: (a map of the Kaas Plains and Black Lake)
(a map of the Ice Warrior's Compound)
(a map of the Phoenix Feather Hot Springs)
(a map of the Arctic Village of Ickle)

objects.ground: A small stone statue of a polar bear sits beside the doorway.

extras.text: The statue is no larger than a medium-sized dog.  It depicts a polar bear, standing alert on four legs, looking forward.  It's carefully carved from the dark stone of nearby mountains, which looks a bit odd when used for this white creature.  The lightly-carved lines depicting its fur are worn completely smooth on the bear's head and back, evidently due to the polishing action of thousands of touching fingers.

objects.ground: A blue scroll has been carelessly left here.
A clear vial is lying on the ground here.
A small scroll has been dropped here.
A glass mug rests here steaming.

extras.text: The glass mug is fairly large with a sturdy handle.

objects.ground: A wine skin lies in a heap on the ground.
A large wine jug has been left here.
A warm loaf of fresh bread is here.
A frozen roll has been left here.

extras.text: Perhaps once quite fluffy and scrumptious, this frozen roll has long felt the biting frost of the arctic climate.  Hard as ice and likely no tastier, the old frozen wheat of this roll is unlikely to become any more platable through thawing--nobody likes a soggy lump of bread.

objects.ground: A dense bread ration sits here.

extras.text: It's a very densely baked piece of ship's-wafer, almost impossible to chew without dunking in hot liquid first. But it has, mixed in with it, various spices that make it tolerable.

objects.ground: A fine fur-lined leather jacket has been left here.
A long thin fur strip is lying here.
A fine piece of fur lies here in a heap.
A deep blue, ice encrusted fountain stands in the middle of the plaza.

extras.text: Years of artic cold have encased this fountain in a thick armor of rock hard ice.  The naturally warm spring that bubbles up through the fountain's base causes condensation to form on the outside of the fountain which almost immediately freezes in this harsh climate.

objects.ground: A large skin leaks discolored liquid here.

extras.text: It appears to be sewn from the hide of a large animal--a caribou from the scent of it.

objects.ground: A bottle with a rose emblem on it sits here.

extras.text: The bottle is clear glass covered by a white label with the image of a red rose upon it.

objects.ground: A handcrafted sign hangs over the shop to the east.
A handcrafted chest sits in the corner.

shops.no_such_item1: %s Nope, I don't got none of those.
shops.no_such_item2: %s Hey what are you trying to pull, you don't have any.
shops.do_not_buy: %s Come on, this is a pub. I don't sell that kinda stuff.
shops.missing_cash1: %s I don't carry that kinda cash!
shops.missing_cash2: %s I ain't runnin' a charity here!

shops.do_not_buy: %s I have no use for that. Sorry.
shops.missing_cash1: %s I can't, I am a simple woman with very little money.
shops.message_buy: %s Thank you for the good deal. I shall remember it.
shops.message_sell: %s Enjoy, they are made with lots of love and care.

shops.no_such_item1: %s Perhaps you should use the 'list' command to views the items I sell.
shops.no_such_item2: %s Surely you are mistaken traveller. You have no such item to sell.
shops.do_not_buy: %s I have no use for such trinkets.
shops.missing_cash1: %s I do not have the resources to purchase such a fine item.
shops.missing_cash2: %s Leave my sight peasant! Return with the proper funds.
shops.message_sell: %s Well chosen traveller, you have fine taste.

shops.no_such_item1: %s Sorry, I can't help you with that.
shops.no_such_item2: %s I don't see that item, what are you trying to sell?
shops.do_not_buy: %s I am a shield guy, I deal only in fine shields.
shops.missing_cash1: %s Sorry friend, I am tapped out.
shops.missing_cash2: %s You don't have that kinda money.
shops.message_sell: %s Good doing business with you, drop by again and say hi!

shops.no_such_item1: %s Sorry, I don't stock that item.
shops.no_such_item2: %s You don't seem to have that.
shops.do_not_buy: %s I don't trade in such items.

shops.no_such_item1: %s Sorry, I don't stock that item.
shops.no_such_item2: %s You don't seem to have that.
shops.do_not_buy: %s I don't trade in such items.

shops.no_such_item1: %s Sorry, I don't stock that item.
shops.no_such_item2: %s You don't seem to have that.
shops.do_not_buy: %s I don't trade in such items.

triggers.name: drunk_ickle_stunts
triggers.commands: set antic %random.3% switch %antic% case 1 shiver emote tries to huddle in the snow for warmth. hiccup say Need a little nip to warm the bones... break case 2 glare say What are you looking at? emote puts up his fists. say Do you want some?  Do ya? fart break default drink drunkdrink burp emote wipes his mouth. say Aaaahhhh thas the good stuff... done

triggers.name: Ickle East Guard
triggers.commands: if %actor.vnum% == -1 if %actor.level% < 20 whisper %actor.name% You are much too little to venture east of here. wait 1 whisper %actor.name% Try other areas first. nudge %actor.name% else return 0 endif else return 0 endif

rooms.name: The Arctic Temple
rooms.description: Judging by all the plants growing around here, this section of the Arctic Temple is used mainly by northern druids.  Sweet-scented pines and pale, tough-looking bushes grow out of the ground, which is bare earth here and not stone like the rest of the temple.  The air seems fresher here too, although really all air in the north smells fresh.  The chittering of small animals can be heard, although none of them are visible.  The temple continues to the south and the altar is to the east.

East.description: You see the Arctic Temple Altar.

rooms.name: The Arctic Temple Altar
rooms.description: An altar made of shining blue ice rises here at the heart of the Arctic Temple, with no signs of crafting upon it.  Rather, it is as if the altar was simply found in its current shape and brough here by the devout.  The walls and ceiling are lavishly decorated with holy symbols of the gods of the north, and prominent among them is the blue rose of Haddixx.  There is an alcove behind the altar, but it is currently empty.  The temple continues to the west, south, and east.

South.description: You see the Entrance to the Arctic Temple.

extras.text: This alcove is empty.  Once it seems that there were some candles or other religious articles placed here, but for now there is nothing.

rooms.name: The Arctic Temple
rooms.description: Standing out of the way, this corner of the Arctic Temple is dedicated to meditation.  Although even the busiest days don't see more than a handful of pilgrims this far north, the quiet in the section of the temple seems unnatural.  It's a bit chilly here, but compared to the normal temperature up north it isn't too bad.  Warm-looking fur mats are laid out on the floor so that those seeking inner peace won't be distracted by the icy floors.  The altar is to the west and the temple also continues to the south.

West.description: You see the Arctic Temple Altar.

rooms.name: The Cleric's Inner Sanctum
rooms.description: Though the heart of any temple's power is at its altar, it seems the second most powerful area of the Arctic Temple is right here.  These chambers are warm, comfortable, and very peaceful.  Symbols of various northern deities are mixed in with personal belongings of Zalish, the High Priest.  A draft of cooler air blows in from the main temple to the east, which is the only exit from this room.

East.description: You see the Entrance to the Cleric's Guild.

rooms.name: Entrance to the Cleric's Guild
rooms.description: This narrow hallway connects the Cleric's Guild to the west with the Arctic Temple to the east.  A warm glow seems to come from the sanctum, though whether this is the result of a holy power or simply due to better heating than the rest of the temple is unclear.  There are usually several guards here blocking the sanctum from outsiders.

West.description: You see the Inner Sanctum of the Cleric's Guild.

rooms.name: The Arctic Temple
rooms.description: Beautifully carved stone descends from the high ceiling of the rest of the temple here, ending in a small passageway to the Cleric's Guild to the west. Hanging from the walls are fantastical carvings made of ice and packed snow, kept from melting by the chilly temperature of the temple.  The entrance to the temple is back to the east and there seem to be a lot of plants growing to the north.

East.description: You see the Entrance to the Arctic Temple.

West.description: You see the Entrance to the Cleric's Guild.

rooms.name: Entrance to the Arctic Temple
rooms.description: Rising out of the snows of the town of Ickle, the Arctic Temple is chilly but lacks the biting cold of the rest of the town.  The entrance area is a large atrium with pillars reaching towards the heavens, and the rare blue arctic rose twines itself around these pillars, blooming regardless of the season.  Although most of the residents of Ickle don't seem to come here on a regular basis, the temple is well cared-for by its acolytes.  The altar is to the north and the temple continues to the east and west.  Blade Square and the rest of Ickle is to the south.

North.description: You see the Arctic Temple Altar.

extras.text: Seeming too delicate to survive in this harsh environment, the blue arctic rose represents the arctic god Haddixx.

rooms.name: The Arctic Temple
rooms.description: The large, open Temple of Haddixx is chilly but not uncomfortable.  Benches to rest on are arranged next to alcoves depicting life in the northlands and the many legends that surround the town of Ickle: the fall of an elven kingdom, a hidden pyramid deep within the ice, a portal with demons emerging from it, and even a mighty white dragon.  Despite these rather violent images, it is very peaceful in here.  The temple continues to the north and west.

West.description: You see the Entrance to the Arctic Temple.

rooms.name: Blade Square
rooms.description: Blade Square truely is unique in this land.  No where else is the air as crisp and captivating.  It could be that Blade Square has surroundings found no where else, but there is just something about it.  The square continues along south and east from this corner.

rooms.name: Blade Square
rooms.description: This section of Blade Square is prone to vicious winds flying through it, chilling even the most heavily covered creature to the bone.  Directly north is the entrance to the Temple of Zalish, while just south lies Ickle's main town fountain.

North.description: You see the Entrance to the Arctic Temple.

South.description: You see the Arctic Square Fountain.

rooms.name: Blade Square
rooms.description: Blade Square extends south and west of here.  There is nothing really noteworthy here.  There wander about a variety of creatures, many of which are the city guards.  The town fountain lies south and west of here.  Yet also east there lies some sort of path or trail ending at an unknown location.

East.description: A sunny path lies to the east.

rooms.name: The Bank of Ickle
rooms.description: This is a small bank branch in Ickle.  It does serve its intended purpose, though it is a wonder why any human would want to run a bank surrounded by barbarians.

rooms.name: Traldi's Weaponry
rooms.description: This is the shop of the notable Traldi Trumward, a renouned story teller. Though he tends to pick the losing side of a battle when placing wagers or even if fighting, his knack is recounting the stories.  Traldi is especially good at recounting savage, unprovoked attacks making them seem docile and even warranted sometimes.  There is much for sale in this shop, much of it discards from battles past.  Forge Boulevard lies to the south.

rooms.name: The Warrior's Inner Sanctum
rooms.description: This simple room serves its function perfectly well.  Warriors from all around share accounts of what they have learned in this training arena.  The one purpose of this room is filled fully and concisely.

East.description: You see the Entrance to the Warrior's Guild.

rooms.name: Entrance to the Warrior's Guild
rooms.description: Here is the entrance for the nearest warriors Inner Sanctum for much of the north.  The building itself speaks of its function, being sparce and concise.

West.description: You see the Inner Sanctum of the Warrior's Guild.

rooms.name: Blade Square
rooms.description: There is the entrance to a large building west of here.  From the looks of it inside would be a kind of guildhouse.  Directly in the opposite direction is the town fountain with a statue rising out of the center of it.  The square extends also north and south.

East.description: You see the Arctic Square Fountain.

West.description: You see the Entrance to the Warrior's Guild.

rooms.name: The Blade Square Fountain
rooms.description: Despite how the fountain may have been in the past, it has long since gone cold.  The water now is cold and bitter, yet still seems like it would be good if the need arose.  Even now that the water runs cold it seems it is the life-blood of this barbarian town.  What ever the cause for the change in the water, it really does not matter.  Blade Square extends in all directions around the fountain, north to the Temple of Zalish, west to the warriors guild, and to various roads to the south and east.

rooms.name: Blade Square
rooms.description: The length of Forge Boulevard extends east of here.  Distantly that direction lies the eastern gates.  The town fountain lies directly west of here with the square continuing west, north, and south.

West.description: You see the Arctic Square Fountain.

rooms.name: Forge Boulevard
rooms.description: Close by to the west there is Blade Square and all of its interesting happenings.  Far to the east on Forge Boulevard lies the east gate of Ickle and a few shops.

rooms.name: Forge Boulevard
rooms.description: There are puddles of some slimy goo around that would probably be good to avoid.  North of here is the small Ickle Bank.  Forge Boulevard continues on east to town gates, or just to the west lies Blade Square.  To the south is the post office.

North.description: You see the FieryMud Bank Branch at Ickle.

rooms.name: Forge Boulevard
rooms.description: Forge Boulevard runs in both directions here.  Further west is Blade Square, and a bit off to the east lies the east gates of Ickle.

rooms.name: Forge Boulevard
rooms.description: There are body parts from some unknown beast strewn on one side of the street which continues east to the east gates, or on further west.  Traldi's Weaponry shop is north, while Vran tends to his leather goods south.

East.description: You see the Inside of the East Gate.

rooms.name: Inside Ickle's East Gate
rooms.description: This is the easternmost outskirts of Ickle.  The strength of these gates appears to have been well tested over time, as they are becoming battered and worn down.  Forge Boulevard lies to the west of here, leading into town.

East.description: You see the Outside of the East Gate.

rooms.name: Outside Ickle's East Gate
rooms.description: This is the outside of Ickle's Eastern Gates.  There is a trail starting off east which almost seems to lead towards a large mountain, which dominates the skyline in that direction.  Ickle lies back to the west, through the battered gates.

East.description: You see the trail to Mt. FrostBite.

West.description: You see the Inside of the East Gate.

rooms.name: Blade Square
rooms.description: There is a large building west of here, though there does not seem to be an entrance for it here.  Blade Square extends in the north and east direction from here, with the town fountain in the center.

rooms.name: Blade Square
rooms.description: Just south of this part of Blade Square is a slightly desolate section of Fire Avenue which runs off to the south.  Just north is Ickle's town fountain. Distantly west there looks to be a large wall of some kind, probably a section of building.

North.description: You see the Arctic Square Fountain.

rooms.name: Blade Square
rooms.description: This corner of Blade Square seems cozy compaired to the rest.  The torch light around illuminates the carved walls, giving them an almost life-like feeling.  Blade Square continues north and west of here.

rooms.name: Vran's Leather Shop
rooms.description: You are standing in Vran's Leather Shop.  Vran is surprisingly well-stocked for such a small shop in the middle of nowhere.  There is only one exit. Snowy Boulevard is just north of here.

rooms.name: Fire Avenue
rooms.description: This is the only north-south road in Ickle, connecting Blade Square to Skull Way and the south gate of town.  Directly north is Blade Square and just south is the intersection with Blood Lane.  The smell of horses drifts in through the wide-open door of a stable to the west.

rooms.name: Karr's Pub
rooms.description: The crowds of Ickle are often unruly and brash.  Those occupying the pub at the moment are no exception.  There is a large amount of drunken, loud creatures roaring and cackling at eachother.  Karr's business indeed is doing quite well, even though few of the folk that do not call Ickle home do not frequent here.  Blood Lane lies to the south, providing some escape from the noise.

rooms.name: The Mage's Inner Sanctum
rooms.description: This is the Inner Sanctum for those who study sorcery around Ickle.  Cold as the other parts of town, this Guildhouse is none the less, different.  It seems as though the room shifts in and out of this plane of existance, seemingly at random, just conveying the raw magic stored within these walls and the ArchMage who stands here.

South.description: You see the Entrance of the Mage's Guild.

rooms.name: Ariana's General Store
rooms.description: Ariana has a quite nice General Store.  It appears as though she has expanded on the original building, making the store wide and vast.  The shelves are stocked high with items for sale, and it does look as though Ariana and her clerk could ward off and attempt at theft.  Blood Lane and Fire Avenue are directly east of here.

rooms.name: Fire Avenue and Blood Lane Intersection
rooms.description: Here Fire Avenue intersects with Blood Lane, which runs off to the east towards a variety of shops.  The torch light on Fire Avenue nicely accentuates the shop signs and advertisements stretching down Blood Lane.  Fire Avenue continues north to Blade Square and south towards the southern gate and to Skull Way.

rooms.name: Blood Lane
rooms.description: The intersection with Fire Avenue lies directly west of here.  To the east Blood Lane continues on to some shops which would likely prove useful to those needing supplies.  Some odd bits of trash litter the street, much of it probably discarded material that no one needed any longer.

rooms.name: The End of Blood Lane
rooms.description: This is a section of town favored particularly by the locals.  Karr's Pub lies north drawing in a majority of the traffic.  Mara's Bakery to the east also seems to pull in some of the town's consumers, while the Yeti Inn to the south houses all the weary travelers that ventured into this land.

rooms.name: Mara's Bakery
rooms.description: Smell is a powerful sense, and the scent of Mara's wonderful baking is becoming overwhelming.  Just west is Blood Lane, but the aroma of freshly baked goods are aluring to most people.

rooms.name: Entrance to the Mage's Guild
rooms.description: This is a small-ish room where coats may be hung.  Stone benches lie on either side of the room.  The south exit leads to a cold snowy street, while a foreboding doorway leads north into the heart of the guild.

North.description: You see the Inner Sanctum of the Mage's Guild.

rooms.name: Fur by Surr
rooms.description: It is quite obvious by the looks of the high quality merchandise here why Surr is all the rage.  There are stacks of interesting clothing, all of which is for sale.  Skull Way lies as the only exit south.

rooms.name: Fire Avenue
rooms.description: This is a relatively plain section of Fire Avenue.  Along the sides still are smoking torches that could be burning more brightly.  It seems that this is where the north part of Ickle connects to the smaller southern part.  Fire Avenue continues north to Blade Square passed Blood Lane, and south to Skull Way and the south gate.

South.description: You see the corner of Frost Avenue and Icy Way.

rooms.name: The Yeti Inn
rooms.description: The Yeti Inn has been heard of all around this land.  That could partially be because people of the north really have no other near by towns to stay safely in for the night.  North lies Blood Lane, while down is the Yeti Inn reception area.

rooms.name: Outside Ickle's West Gate
rooms.description: This is to the outside of the Western Gates of Ickle.  West from this point begins the Sirestis Trail, which does not see much traffic and is becoming overgrown in spots.  The town Ickle lies east of here.

East.description: You see the Inside of the West Gate.

rooms.name: Inside Ickle's West Gate
rooms.description: This is the westernmost outskirts of Ickle.  The strength of these gates appears to have been well tested over time, as they are becoming battered and worn down.  Skull Way lies to the east of here, leading into town.

West.description: You see the Outside of the West Gate.

rooms.name: Skull Way
rooms.description: Skull way begins here, leading east into the snowy village.  The town gates are directly to the west.  On the north is an imposing structure with stone walls with stout wooden beams reinforcing the corners; it bears the mark of the Sorcerers' Guild.  To the south, a smaller stone building gives off a flickering bluish light through the narrow doorway.  A sign beside the door states simply, "Kilaxi Magic Shop".

North.description: You see the Entrance to the Mage's Guild.

West.description: You see the Inside of the West Gate.

rooms.name: Skull Way
rooms.description: The light along Skull Way is dimmer here than most other parts of the road. Immediately east is a section of shops, and further along east is the intersection with Fire Avenue.  West of here is the western town gates, and the mages guildhouse.

rooms.name: Skull Way
rooms.description: The buzz about this strip of Skull way is Fur by Surr to the north.  There is also a smaller shop housing Garm's Shields south.  Off further west is the western gate while is seems busy further east towards the intersection of Skull Way with Fire Avenue.

North.description: You see the "Fur by Surr" shop.

rooms.name: Skull Way
rooms.description: This section of Skull Way has surprisingly little traffic considering how busy it is both east and west of here.  To the east is the intersection of Skull Way with Fire Avenue, while west are some shops and distantly the west gate.

East.description: You see the corner of Icy Way and Frost Avenue.

rooms.name: The Corner of Fire Avenue and Skull Way
rooms.description: This is one of the busier intersections of Ickle.  Skull way extending off to the west towards some shops and the western gate meets with Fire Avenue which leads to the northern part of town.  Directly east is the Mercenary guildhouse and south is the southern gate leading out of town.

East.description: You see the Entrance to the Ranger's Guild.

South.description: You see the Inside of the South Gate.

rooms.name: Entrance to the Mercenary's Guild
rooms.description: This is the entrance to the Mercenary's Inner Sanctum here in Ickle.  It would seem many rogue types enter this place, but it is not really known why. All true rogues, once they complete any formal training, usually never return. The inside is east, and there is the intersection of Skull Way and Fire Avenue west.

East.description: You see the Inner Sanctum of the Ranger's Guild.

West.description: You see the corner of Frost Avenue and Icy Way.

rooms.name: The Mercenary Inner Sanctum
rooms.description: This is the training ground for those who are alone much of the time.  The training area is sharply contrasted, the more advanced of the mercenaries study on the northern side, while the newer ones begin in the southern section.  A very elite and highly trained mercenary stands here prepared to help those worthy.

West.description: You see the Entrance to the Ranger's Guild.

rooms.name: Kilaxi's Magic Shop
rooms.description: Kilaxi's Magic Shop, being the nearest shop of spells for great distances, makes him quite wealthy.  Aside from the store being in a state of utter chaos, it is well stocked with magical merchandise for the pleasure or amusement of those who might purchase them.  Skull Way lies as the only exit from here, to the north.

rooms.name: Garm's Shields
rooms.description: Garm has a fabulous selection of shields avalible for purchase.  Though some of the better and more expensive of them have been sold, there are still many quality items avalible.  Garm has always had a healthy competition between he and Surr, who's shop lies just across Skull Way to the north.

rooms.name: Inside Ickle's South Gate
rooms.description: This is the southernmost outskirts of Ickle.  The strength of these gates appears to have been well tested over time, as they are becoming battered and worn down.  Fire Avenue lies to the north of here, leading into town.

North.description: You see the corner of Frost Avenue and Icy Way.

South.description: You see the Outside of the South Gate.

rooms.name: Outside Ickle's South Gate
rooms.description: This is the outside of Ickle's Southern Gates.  Just south is the beginning of Nikozian Trail, which heads south to green fields and warmer climates.

North.description: You see the Inside of the South Gate.

rooms.name: The Yeti Inn Reception Area
rooms.description: The reception area of the Yeti Inn is highly decorated, probably trying to draw in patrons though that effort is unnessecary.  The insides of the rooms are probably not this nice, but that cannot be determined until after you rent for the night.

Up.description: You see the Entrance to the Yeti Inn.

rooms.name: The Ickle Post Office
rooms.description: The room is small and cozy with dark hardwood floors as if some form of company with deep pockets could build a sturdy post in this barren wilderness. A long counter adorns the south side of the room with barred embattlements spaced as though lines should form infront of each.  There are slots along the west side and a list of times on a sign.

rooms.name: Faric's Stables
rooms.description: Faric's stables hold a variety of mounts, from staid, locally-bred clydesdales to spirited mustangs captured from nearby herds.  The stalls appear to be clean and well-maintained.  The smell is rather strong, however.  To the east lies the street, with its crisp fresh air.

rooms.name: Faric's Backroom
rooms.description: Faric's backroom, YOU SHOULD NOT BE HERE!  Tell a god.

rooms.name: Map Shop
rooms.description: The room is filled with empty shelves.  It is like the cartographer has only recently set up shop here.  He has a large chest in the corner hand carved with the same design as the sign outside the shop.  Certainly, this could be made into a wonderful business but something must be done about the smell from across the road.
